title: Installation issue:Go-md2man failing
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue
This error is being thrown during the installation of charliecloud/0.10. It occurs in the Go-md2man package. I have found go forums online that hint at the possibility of a naming conflict as `GO` is installed first. Then `Go-md2man` is installed and is creating identical files, thus causing the error. I cannot confirm this is the actual issue at this time however. Steps to reproduce are as follows below: 
`spack install charliecloud@0.10+builder+docs`
The resulting error output is below.
```console
$ spack install charliecloud@0.10+builder+docs

```
 ==> Executing phase: 'install'

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux $machine 3.10.0-957.21.3.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Jun 18 16:35:19 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ cat /etc/redhat-release
CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810 (Core) 
``` 
### Additional information
Expected output is simply charlecloud/0.10 building without issue.
